content.raw: Is there any progress on this issue or better general “how to add new robot configuration with CloudSim”? We would like to add new configuration of ground vehicle X2 \+ lidar \(30m\) \+ RGBD camera. My colleague experiment with it but it seems that on start it access online \(!\) prices/points for the configuration? So far it does not work. For us it is “blocker” as for Urban we need better 3D info.
content.html: Is there any progress on this issue or better general “how to add new robot configuration with CloudSim”? We would like to add new configuration of ground vehicle X2 + lidar (30m) + RGBD camera. My colleague experiment with it but it seems that on start it access online (!) prices/points for the configuration? So far it does not work. For us it is “blocker” as for Urban we need better 3D info.
